revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.
Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Looks good; regularize in r.1 instead of |ed| tags; remove second set of |ed| tags in r.2; print iota adscript in r.4; dot ταύτ̣α̣[ in r.7; remove |ed| tags in r.8 and add number tags; dot alpha gamma in r.8; add number tags in r.10; dot kappa hypsilon in r.10; dot first epsilon of r.11; remove |ed| tags in r.13; check apostrophes throughout; regularize instead of |ed| tags in r.14; dot last delta in r.14; dot first iota in r.15 and remove |ed| tags; remove |ed| tags in r.15; dot final alpha iota in r.15; dot first epsilon of r.17; remove |ed| tags in r.21; dot first epsilon in r.22 and add [.?] to end of line; print iota adscript in v.1, 2, 11, 13; dot final alpha in v.3; add number tags in v.4 (followed by comma); add comma after σιτέονται in v.5; ed.pr. prints σ̣ι̣\ν/ at end of v.8; add space in v.12; dot final eta of v.13; dot final tau of v.14; fix document division for verso; ed.pr. prints ἐκ not ἕν in v.ii.3; dot final hypsilon of v.ii.4 instead of square brackets; remove |ed| tags in v.ii.6; print iota adscript in v.ii.6, 7, 12, 13, 19; regularize words separately in v.ii.7; remove |ed| tags in v.ii.8; add number tags in v.ii.10; add number tags in v.ii.12-13, 14; remove |ed| tags in v.ii.17; add [.?] to end of v.ii. Review all metadata before finalization.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Looks good; regularize in r.1 instead of |ed| tags; remove second set of |ed| tags in r.2; print iota adscript in r.4; dot ταύτ̣α̣[ in r.7; remove |ed| tags in r.8 and add number tags; dot alpha gamma in r.8; add number tags in r.10; dot kappa hypsilon in r.10; dot first epsilon of r.11; remove |ed| tags in r.13; check apostrophes throughout; regularize instead of |ed| tags in r.14; dot last delta in r.14; dot first iota in r.15 and remove |ed| tags; remove |ed| tags in r.15; dot final alpha iota in r.15; dot first epsilon of r.17; remove |ed| tags in r.21; dot first epsilon in r.22 and add [.?] to end of line; print iota adscript in v.1, 2, 11, 13; dot final alpha in v.3; add number tags in v.4 (followed by comma); add comma after σιτέονται in v.5; ed.pr. prints σ̣ι̣\ν/ at end of v.8; add space in v.12; dot final eta of v.13; dot final tau of v.14; fix document division for verso; ed.pr. prints ἐκ not ἕν in v.ii.3; dot final hypsilon of v.ii.4 instead of square brackets; remove |ed| tags in v.ii.6; print iota adscript in v.ii.6, 7, 12, 13, 19; regularize words separately in v.ii.7; remove |ed| tags in v.ii.8; add number tags in v.ii.10; add number tags in v.ii.12-13, 14; remove |ed| tags in v.ii.17; add [.?] to end of v.ii. Review all metadata before finalization.
Submit - We've made the transcription of the text and apparatus criticus. We've updated the inventory number, added an introduction, moved Legacy name to Display name, added dimensions.
Submit - We've made the transcription of the text and apparatus criticus. We've updated the inventory number, added an introduction, moved Legacy name to Display name, added dimensions.
